channel.title: [PI] Pk-Heaven [Development team]
channel.description:
[center][b][size=12pt]Pk-Heaven[/size][/b]
I am looking for staff to help set up a new server!
Base: Project Insanity
The positions I am looking for are as follows:
Server coder = 0/1 Client coder = 0/1 Forum creator = 0/1 Forum Admin = 0/2 In-game Admin = 1/3 In-game Moderator = 0/3
Note: Coders and Forum creator will receive a cut of the donations but we will discuss this when we reach that point.
Application [code]Position wanted: Experience: Any past work we can see or someone we can talk to to make sure?: Will you abuse your powers if you are Admin/Mod?: Will you complete your work and not slack off/not do your job?: Why do you think you'd benefit Pk-Heaven?: Why do you want this job?: Any additional information: Msn:[/code]
[b]You may apply for up to 2 positions[/b] [/center]
Features: -Working Easter ring, Ring of stone & NEW Glarial's Amulet tweak -All dupes fixed. Some fixed dupes include: Arrow/bolt dupe, trade/bank/duel X-log dupe, Cheat Engine Dupe, Any other dupe? = FIXED -New Custom Minigame, leveling skills earn you points that can be used to buy items at shop -God Wars 3/4 bosses -Chaotic Rapier / Longsword / Maul with approximately correct stance and fighting style ADDED -All 6 Spirit Shields ADDED -Full Dragon Helmet ADDED -Berserker, Warrior, Archer, Seers Ring (i) ADDED ( the new imbued one ) -Rocktail Food ADDED -Vengeance working !!! -Fully Working Enchanted Gem in shop -All Artefacts ADDED, you can activate them to retrieve cash -New HP Bars -New Helpful Quest tab interface -Many more things....im so tired to remember them

item.title: [PI] Pk-Heaven [Development team]
item.dc:creator: @Cortiz Cortiz
item.description:
@Cortiz wrote:

Position wanted: Forum Creator

Experience: I have created alot of forums, vbulletin, Joomla, Simplemachines, and a few others, During all of these forums i have created I have been a owner.

Any past work we can see or someone we can talk to to make sure?: Desolationx.net (just got demoted, probely in the latest news)

Will you abuse your powers if you are Admin/Mod?: I will not

Will you complete your work and not slack off/not do your job?: Will do whatever I can to help, however times of the essence

Why do you think you’d benefit Pk-Heaven?: Im good at forums,

Why do you want this job?: For the cut, and I need a new server to stay with

Any additional information:Msn:
For further information about my msn please send me a PM on here, I will not post it here

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Pk-Heaven [Development team]
item.dc:creator: @I_Am_Sparta I Am Sparta
item.description:
@I_Am_Sparta wrote:

Position wanted: Server Coder and Forum Creator.
Experience: Yes and I have proof.
Any past work we can see or someone we can talk to to make sure?: Yea just talk to me on msn and I’ll show you.
Will you abuse your powers if you are Admin/Mod?: Never.
Will you complete your work and not slack off/not do your job?: Ofcourse.
Why do you think you’d benefit Pk-Heaven?: Well I have been coding for about 5 years now so i know what I am doing also I have made multiple forums and I am pretty good at it.
Why do you want this job?: Because my server just went down because I lost my VPS so I wanna work on a new one with someone who can host
Any additional information: Uhm nope thats it
Msn: mo139026@live.com

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Pk-Heaven [Development team]
item.dc:creator: @vrac_defiled vrac defiled
item.description:
@vrac_defiled wrote:

Position wanted: Ingame Admin
Experience: 3 years
Any past work we can see or someone we can talk to to make sure?: Dunno, you can try to find someone if you want lol
Will you abuse your powers if you are Admin/Mod?: ummm no?
Will you complete your work and not slack off/not do your job?: yes
Why do you think you’d benefit Pk-Heaven?: Because I can also code (not the best but I can do some coding). However, I quit coding so I will not be a full-time coder, only a backup.
Why do you want this job?: I want this job because I quit all RSPS a month ago and I miss it XD
Any additional information: 16, live in canada, my name is Max
Msn: maximalx5@live.ca

Read full topic

item.description:
@james_adams wrote:

Yes I did as he released his server and client publicly but I plan on making this server unique, the features I posted are just the current features in the game .

As long as it’s a PI it won’t be unique.

item.title: [PI] Pk-Heaven [Development team]
item.dc:creator: @floydy floydy
item.description:
@floydy wrote:

mr extremez:

He took all the features from sagi lol

Yes I did as he released his server and client publicly but I plan on making this server unique, the features I posted are just the current features in the game ;).

[quote=“I own all the cookies, post:4, topic:393540”]Position wanted:Forum creator
Experience:I have made forums over the past.
Any past work we can see or someone we can talk to to make sure?: No sorry same thing as my app below.
Will you abuse your powers if you are Admin/Mod?:No
Will you complete your work and not slack off/not do your job?: Of course
Why do you think you’d benefit Pk-Heaven?: Because I could set up the forums in a nicely and easily to manuver around.
Why do you want this job?:Because I would like to do forums again, plus I love Pi
Any additional information:Im a first poster because I dont usually use moparscape and forgot my password to my account here.

Position wanted:Ingame Admin
Experience:Ive been admin on 2 other servers
Any past work we can see or someone we can talk to to make sure?:Nope other owners closed there servs down and quite rsps.
Will you abuse your powers if you are Admin/Mod?: No I would not.
Will you complete your work and not slack off/not do your job?:I would complete my work.
Why do you think you’d benefit Pk-Heaven?: Because im a pretty responsible person.
Why do you want this job?:For the fun of it.
Any additional information: I would make a good Admin.[/quote]Thank you for your reply, at this moment in time I’m looking for a coder to help code the server and client with me before I start the forums. Please leave your msn so I can add you and we can talk further.

Read full topic

item.description:
@floydy wrote:

[center][size=12pt]Pk-Heaven[/size]

I am looking for staff to help set up a new server!

Base: Project Insanity

The positions I am looking for are as follows:

Server coder = 0/1
Client coder = 0/1
Forum creator = 0/1
Forum Admin = 0/2
In-game Admin = 1/3
In-game Moderator = 0/3

Note: Coders and Forum creator will receive a cut of the donations but we will discuss this when we reach that point.

Application

Position wanted: Experience: Any past work we can see or someone we can talk to to make sure?: Will you abuse your powers if you are Admin/Mod?: Will you complete your work and not slack off/not do your job?: Why do you think you'd benefit Pk-Heaven?: Why do you want this job?: Any additional information: Msn:

You may apply for up to 2 positions
[/center]

Features:
-Working Easter ring, Ring of stone & NEW Glarial’s Amulet tweak
-All dupes fixed. Some fixed dupes include: Arrow/bolt dupe, trade/bank/duel X-log dupe, Cheat Engine Dupe, Any other dupe? = FIXED
-New Custom Minigame, leveling skills earn you points that can be used to buy items at shop
-God Wars 3/4 bosses
-Chaotic Rapier / Longsword / Maul with approximately correct stance and fighting style ADDED
-All 6 Spirit Shields ADDED
-Full Dragon Helmet ADDED
-Berserker, Warrior, Archer, Seers Ring (i) ADDED ( the new imbued one )
-Rocktail Food ADDED
-Vengeance working !!!
-Fully Working Enchanted Gem in shop
-All Artefacts ADDED, you can activate them to retrieve cash
-New HP Bars
-New Helpful Quest tab interface
-Many more things…im so tired to remember them
